33 
34 /* ---------- code to work on different compilers and architectures -------------------- */
35 
36 #if defined(__GNUC__) /* current gcc and g++ have enough C99 support to use this port */ \
37  || (defined(_MSC_VER) && defined(__cplusplus)) /* Microsoft Visual Studio as a C++ compiler supports enough C99 to compile */
38 
39 #include "scom_port_c99.h"
40 #else
41 #error "target or compiler not supported"
42 #endif

52 #define SCOM_NBR_ELEMENTS(array) (sizeof(array)/sizeof((array)[0]))
53 
58 #define SCOM_MIN(a, b) ((a) < (b) ? (a) : (b))
59 
64 #define SCOM_MAX(a, b) ((a) > (b) ? (a) : (b))

73 #define SCOM_FRAME_HEADER_SIZE 14
74 
78 typedef enum {
79  SCOM_ERROR_NO_ERROR = 0x0000,
81  /* data link errors */
82  SCOM_ERROR_INVALID_FRAME = 0x0001,
83  SCOM_ERROR_DEVICE_NOT_FOUND = 0x0002,
84  SCOM_ERROR_RESPONSE_TIMEOUT = 0x0003,
86  /* service errors */
87  SCOM_ERROR_SERVICE_NOT_SUPPORTED = 0x0011,
88  SCOM_ERROR_INVALID_SERVICE_ARGUMENT = 0x0012,
89  SCOM_ERROR_GATEWAY_BUSY = 0x0013,
91  /* read/write property errors */
92  SCOM_ERROR_TYPE_NOT_SUPPORTED = 0x0021,
93  SCOM_ERROR_OBJECT_ID_NOT_FOUND = 0x0022,
94  SCOM_ERROR_PROPERTY_NOT_SUPPORTED = 0x0023,
95  SCOM_ERROR_INVALID_DATA_LENGTH = 0x0024,
97  /* write property errors */
98  SCOM_ERROR_PROPERTY_IS_READ_ONLY = 0x0025,
99  SCOM_ERROR_INVALID_DATA = 0x0026,
100  SCOM_ERROR_DATA_TOO_SMALL = 0x0027,
101  SCOM_ERROR_DATA_TOO_BIG = 0x0028,
102  SCOM_ERROR_WRITE_PROPERTY_FAILED = 0x0029,
103  SCOM_ERROR_READ_PROPERTY_FAILED = 0x002A,
104  SCOM_ERROR_ACCESS_DENIED = 0x002B,
105  SCOM_ERROR_OBJECT_NOT_SUPPORTED = 0x002C,
106  SCOM_ERROR_MULTICAST_READ_NOT_SUPPORTED = 0x002D,
108  /* error in the client application */
109  SCOM_ERROR_INVALID_SHELL_ARG = 0x0081,
110  SCOM_ERROR_STACK_PORT_NOT_FOUND = 0x0082,
111  SCOM_ERROR_STACK_PORT_INIT_FAILED = 0x0083,
112  SCOM_ERROR_STACK_PORT_WRITE_FAILED = 0x0084,
113  SCOM_ERROR_STACK_PORT_READ_FAILED = 0x0085,
114  SCOM_ERROR_STACK_BUFFER_TOO_SMALL = 0x0086,
115  SCOM_ERROR_STACK_PROPERTY_HEADER_DOESNT_MATCH = 0x0087
117 } scom_error_t;
118

123 typedef enum {
124  SCOM_READ_PROPERTY_SERVICE = 0x1,
125  SCOM_WRITE_PROPERTY_SERVICE = 0x2
126 } scom_service_t;
127 
132 typedef enum {
133  SCOM_FORMAT_INVALID_FORMAT = 0,
134 
135  /* 1 byte */
136  SCOM_FORMAT_BOOL = 1,
137 
138  /* 2 bytes */
139  SCOM_FORMAT_FORMAT = 2,
140  SCOM_FORMAT_ENUM = 3,
141  SCOM_FORMAT_ERROR = 4,
142 
143  /* 4 bytes */
144  SCOM_FORMAT_INT32 = 5,
145  SCOM_FORMAT_FLOAT = 6,
146 
147  /* n bytes */
148  SCOM_FORMAT_STRING = 7,
149  SCOM_FORMAT_DYNAMIC = 8,
150  SCOM_FORMAT_BYTE_STREAM = 9
151 
152 } scom_format_t;
153 
154 
158 typedef struct {
159  int reserved7to5:3;
160  int is_new_datalogger_file_present:1;
161  int is_sd_card_full:1;
162  int is_sd_card_present:1;
163  int was_rcc_reseted:1;
164  int is_message_pending:1;
165 } scom_frame_flags_t;
166 
167 
171 typedef struct {
172  int reserved7to2:6;
173  int is_response:1;
174  int error:1;
175 } scom_service_flags_t;

183 typedef struct {
184  scom_frame_flags_t frame_flags;
185  uint32_t src_addr;
186  uint32_t dst_addr;
188  scom_service_flags_t service_flags;
189  scom_service_t service_id;
192  size_t data_length;
193 
195  scom_error_t last_error;
196 
197  char* buffer;
198  size_t buffer_size;
199 } scom_frame_t;
